mapper.update: UPDATE case_negotiations SET ExpectResloveTypeValue = #{expectResloveTypeValue}, OtherContext = #{otherContext}, PayAmount = #{payAmount}, CounterClaimPayment = #{counterClaimPayment}, PaymentEndDate = #{paymentEndDate}, ShipmentPayType = #{shipmentPayType}, SpecialItem = #{specialItem}, Status = #{status}, LastModifiedDate = #{lastModifiedDate}, LastModifiedBy = #{lastModifiedBy} WHERE Id = #{id}
UPDATE files SET DeleteFlag = #{deleteFlag}, LastModifiedDate = #{lastModifiedDate}, LastModifiedBy = #{lastModifiedBy} WHERE Id = #{id}
UPDATE case_file_relations SET DeleteFlag = #{deleteFlag}, LastModifiedDate = #{lastModifiedDate}, LastModifiedBy = #{lastModifiedBy} WHERE FileId = #{fileId}
